channel.title: Cant get into Mopar
channel.description:
Hi there, I'm on a Mac computer and when I try to play Mopar on the internet it's just a blank screen.. I'm new and really want to play, can anyone help me? Thanks.
I downloaded the client and that lets me get in with a made up username and password. I start with all skills at 99 and no new items or skills (like summoning or d claws). All I want to do is to go into someone elses server with other people and normal things!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:
BIGGER PROBLEM NOW: GETTING A T2 ERROR ON THE CLIENT, WTH! :mad: :mad:
bump

item.title: Cant get into Mopar
item.dc:creator: @hihid27 hihid27
item.description:
@hihid27 wrote:

Download the moparscape client… then hit start server…

[edit]
nvm… mopar has a server status page, you can find a server there and type in the ip in your mopar client (if it works)

Read full topic
